definition: another word for chromium when it is used in dyes or pigments, to plate with chromium, causing the surface to become metallic and shiny
details:
noun
- another word for chromium when it is used in dyes or pigments
verb
- to plate with chromium, causing the surface to become metallic and shiny
= example: to plate with chromium, causing the surface to become metallic and shiny
= synonyms: chromium-plate
